experience.title: Global Strategy Intern

experience.title: Financial Modeling and Investment Apprasial on Dr.Reddy‚Äôs Laboratories
experience.description: ‚Äì Prepared a Business overview Report which includes Financial analysis and SWOT, PEST Analysis along with competitor and Pharmaceutical Industry Analysis in Context to Indian Market.‚Äì Implemented data regression to calculate Beta Value (0.35) and Industry Beta (0.92) which helped in maintaining constant Promoters stake of 26% Over a period of the last 5 years.‚Äì Financial Ratio analysis showed a significant Decrease in Long term Debt to Equity by 95% and Financials, Industry Analysis suggested increasing stock prices in the near future by 22.7%.
